statgraphics
Class PlotFactory

java.lang.Object
  statgraphics.GraphicalAnalysis
      statgraphics.PlotFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
Plot2DFactory, Plot3DFactory
public abstract class PlotFactory
extends GraphicalAnalysis

This abstract class contains a method for obtaining the object which creates 2D or 3D statistical plots.
